kalakirunu ejapa manthriwaru kiyathiasela kuruluwanshamewara ejapa mayi raliya saha pe්ramadasa guna samaruwa ranil - sajith dedena pakshaya thula thama balaya penwime wadasatahan bawata pathkara ganima nisa kalakirunu ejapa manthriwaru pirisak uthsawa dekama warjanaya kirimata thiranaya kara atha.mema thaththwaya salakillata gena siyalu aasana sanwidhayakawarunta yapanaye pawathwena ejapa mayi raliyata sahabhagi wima ejapa nayakathwaya wisin aniwarya karanu laba thibe.kruthyadhikari mandala raswimedi ranil wikramasinha mahatha wisin adala danum dima sidukara thibena athara sajith pe්ramadasa mahatha ema awasthawe muniwatha raka athayi danagannata atha.kese wuwath yapanaye pawathwena ejapa mayi raliyata wada wadi senangak kolambaa pe්ramadasa guna samaruwata sahabhagi karawimata sajith pe්ramadasa mahatha katayuthu karamin sitina athara pradeshiya mattamin ee pilibandawa sakachcha wata kihipayak da pawathwa thibe.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

kendraye ashuba sthanaya ata weyi.atata kisima grahayaku subha natha.kotinma ate kisima grahayek nositana tharamatama hondayi. 9 wana bhawaya - (9 weni kotuwa ) darma sthanayayi.punyasthanaya ,dharma sthanaya,shubhasthanaya lesada handinwe.piyata salakima,nithigarukathwaya,dewa aagamika bhakthiya,puda puja,kalyanamithra sewanaya,usas adhyapana,paryeshana,nawa nirmana,nawa sankalpa,prabhu asura,daruwange usaswim,aadiya salaka baleyi.8 kendraye ashubha sthanaya men 9 kotuwa kendraye shuba sthanaya lesa salake.niyama papayaku nichawa ate sitiyahoth samahara wita ashubhapala deyi.eeth ee grahayata ayithi sthanaya ha sambandha karunu pamanak hani karayi.
mu mechchara kal liyala thiyenne okkoma boru.
ohu muhunadena athdakim idiriyedi lokayatama balagatha hakiya.
na kiyanne na mama .

anura kumara hari.wyawasthawa sanshodhanaya karanakota aramuna abhimarthaya une janadhipathi hithuwakkari lesa parlimant eka wisuruwa harime balaya awama kirima.mokada moda minissu sampradayak nathi miharakne ban janadhipathila wenne me rate.un awurudden awuruddata wisuruwa hari.nikan mahajana salli kabasiniya karanawa,ratath kabasiniya karanawa.ee wage kalakanni thamayi path wenne.eeka awuruddak thibba waganthiya ayin karala awurudu hatharak damma.

inpasuwa na kiyagena kariya,allapa sallapaye ha prawruththi balimata patan gaththaya.puwath wikasha 3k pamana ekadigata balimen anathuruwa kastiya kotu kotu darshana warayak sadaha set wiya.man thama podi eka nisa saha gaman mahansiyath nisa ra kama ganimen pasu ma blankettuwak thulata wi guliwiya.namuth awasanawata,madiyam raye siduwu darunu wag prahara malawak narambaime awasthawa mata mis wiya.(katussata ha anopilista nam oowa mathaka nalu ya.ebawin owungen wimasimen walakinna)

pasu­giya wasare dari­ya­kata thilina prada­naya kala awa­sthawa siyalu daru dari­yanta wasa­raka kala­ya­kata awashya wana abhyasa poth path siya­llama siyalu pasal upa­ka­rana pasal bag sapaththu jodu dekak ha nila adum 3kda mala­la­se­kara shabda kosha­yakda himi wana athara pawu­la­tama sari­lana wiyali salaka mallak masa­yaka kala­yak sandaha sapa­yenu atha.

mahawanshaye karthru mahanama himiyan ge bana kenek wu dhathusena rajathuma(kri.wa. 459-477) gen sihasuna udura gath kassapa (kri.wa. 477-495) rajupilibanda dadi pilikulak misa prasadayak mahanama himiyan thula nothibuna nisama eepithru ghathakaya pilibanda ho ohuge maligaya pilibanda wadi wistharayak dimata mahawanshakathuwaraya mali wuwata saka natha.ruhuna wishwawidyalaye mahacharya wini witharana ee pilibanda mese adahasdakwayi.

aarambhaka sabhapathi loka akshi dana sangamaya deshabandu waidya hadsan silwa, karunarathna abesekara, hitapu deshiya waidya amathi gaurawaniya (waidya) dharmasena aatigala, hitapu wawili amathi gaurawaniya rupa karunathilaka, sinhalaye mahasammatha bhumiputhra pakshaye nayaka aacharya harishchandra wijayathunga, prawina chithrapata nalu saha wedika nalu, nataka karthru aacharya henri jayasena, hitapu silon krikat kridaka ha engalantha lankashayar kridaka stanli jayasinha, chithrapata nalu rawindra rupasena, chithrapata nalu aananda wirakon, kirthimath siwil niladhari rijwe thilakarathna gunadasa amarasekarasekarayange nolambaa nalanda widyalayaye samakalinayoya.[2][3] lanka wishwa widyalaye upadhidhariyaku wana amarasekara wruththiyen dantha waidyawarayeki.
dakunu koriyawe yodha shishnayan sahitha udyanayak athayi kiwwoth oba puduma wanu athi.

wayasa, sthri purusha bhawaya, wargaya, wargikathwaya, jathika sambhawaya, aagama, lingika dishanathiya, aabadhithabhawaya, bhashawa saha samaja aarthika thaththwaya wani sanskruthika, pudgala ha bhumikawa pilibanda wadi wisthara igenimata puhunukaruwan uthsaha darayi.

mema dagab wahanse raththanapitiye saha raththanapitiya awata gamwasinge aadhara athiwa, "shri sujatha upasika samithiya" magin 1956 wasare mayi masa 11 wana dina nirmanaya wuwaki. 1954 wasare chaithyarajayanan wahanse idi kirima sadaha mul gala thaba athi athara parithyagashili pinwathunge aadharada athiwa ikmanin chaithyarajayanan wahansege wada nimawu bawin 1955 wasare koth paladawime saha sharirika dhathun thanpath kirime katayuthu sidu kerunu bawa warthawala satahan wi thibe.
